mapper.select: SELECT ID, USER_NO, PASS, USER_NAME, MOBILE_NO, USER_AGE, USER_BIRTH, USER_TYPE, CASE USER_TYPE WHEN 1 THEN '管理员' WHEN 2 THEN '普通用户' ELSE USER_TYPE END USER_TYPE_NAME, STATUS, BANK_NO, BANK_NAME, REAL_NAME, WX_NO, ZFB_NO, WX_FILE_URL, ZFB_FILE_URL, DATE_FORMAT(CRITE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') CRITE_TIME, CRITE_USER FROM T_Dity_USER T WHERE T.USER_NO = #{USER_NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_DITY_USER ( ID, USER_NO, PASS, USER_NAME, USER_TYPE, STATUS, PARENT_NO, CRITE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{ID}, #{USER_NO}, #{PASS}, #{USER_NAME}, #{USER_TYPE}, #{STATUS}, #{PARENT_NO}, SYSDATE() )
